showScoreExcerpt:
a thunderous reaction to the show by much of the audience, who were surely primed both out of affection for Sondheim…and as an affirmation of the pleasure and power of gathering in person. If the timing of this production enhances its enchantment, the appeal is undeniable. That is largely because of the cast, who bring out the fractured fairy tale humor…while delivering the songs as beautifully as I’ve ever heard them.
